entry.sentence: Rosemarie traveled with Mrs. Ellen to their new destination after a heartfelt farewell from Mrs. von Schwarzburg .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD traveled) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (NNP Mrs.) (NNP Ellen)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ new) (NN destination))))) (PP (IN after) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ heartfelt) (NN farewell)) (PP (IN from) (NP (NNP Mrs.) (NNP von) (NNP Schwarzburg)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(traveled-2, Rosemarie-1) root(ROOT-0, traveled-2) nn(Ellen-5, Mrs.-4) prep_with(traveled-2, Ellen-5) poss(destination-9, their-7) amod(destination-9, new-8) prep_to(Ellen-5, destination-9) det(farewell-13, a-11) amod(farewell-13, heartfelt-12) prep_after(traveled-2, farewell-13) nn(Schwarzburg-17, Mrs.-15) nn(Schwarzburg-17, von-16) prep_from(farewell-13, Schwarzburg-17)

entry.sentence: The two ladies were in a first-class compartment , which they shared with several other ladies .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT The) (CD two) (NNS ladies)) (VP (VBD were) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ first-class) (NN compartment)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD shared) (PP (IN with) (NP (JJ several) (JJ other) (NNS ladies))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(ladies-3, The-1) num(ladies-3, two-2) nsubj(were-4, ladies-3) root(ROOT-0, were-4) det(compartment-8, a-6) amod(compartment-8, first-class-7) prep_in(were-4, compartment-8) dobj(shared-12, compartment-8) rel(shared-12, which-10) nsubj(shared-12, they-11) rcmod(compartment-8, shared-12) amod(ladies-16, several-14) amod(ladies-16, other-15) prep_with(shared-12, ladies-16)

entry.sentence: Mrs. Ellen chatted animatedly with Rosemarie .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Mrs.) (NNP Ellen)) (VP (VBD chatted) (ADVP (RB animatedly)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NNP Rosemarie)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Ellen-2, Mrs.-1) nsubj(chatted-3, Ellen-2) root(ROOT-0, chatted-3) advmod(chatted-3, animatedly-4) prep_with(chatted-3, Rosemarie-6)

entry.sentence: They had plenty to talk about .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP They)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB plenty)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB talk) (PRT (RP about)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(had-2, They-1) xsubj(talk-5, They-1) root(ROOT-0, had-2) advmod(had-2, plenty-3) aux(talk-5, to-4) xcomp(had-2, talk-5) prt(talk-5, about-6)

entry.sentence: Mrs. Ellen had traveled a lot in the past , and she knew many of the places where Rosemarie had stayed with her mother .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (NNP Mrs.) (NNP Ellen)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN traveled) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN lot)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN past))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD knew) (NP (NP (JJ many)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNS places)))) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (NNP Rosemarie)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN stayed) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN mother))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nn(Ellen-2, Mrs.-1) nsubj(traveled-4, Ellen-2) aux(traveled-4, had-3) root(ROOT-0, traveled-4) det(lot-6, a-5) dobj(traveled-4, lot-6) det(past-9, the-8) prep_in(lot-6, past-9) nsubj(knew-13, she-12) conj_and(traveled-4, knew-13) dobj(knew-13, many-14) det(places-17, the-16) prep_of(many-14, places-17) advmod(stayed-21, where-18) nsubj(stayed-21, Rosemarie-19) aux(stayed-21, had-20) advcl(knew-13, stayed-21) poss(mother-24, her-23) prep_with(stayed-21, mother-24)
